Package stackmachine.machine

Class SimpleStackMachine

java.lang.Object
stackmachine.machine.SimpleStackMachine
public class SimpleStackMachine
extends java.lang.Object
A Simple Stack Machine implementation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int DEFAULT_MEM_SIZE
    The default memory size in words (each word is 4 bytes).

  • Constructor Summary

    Initialise a new machine.

    Initialise a new machine.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_MEM_SIZE

      public static final int DEFAULT_MEM_SIZE
      The default memory size in words (each word is 4 bytes).
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleStackMachine

      public SimpleStackMachine()
      Initialise a new machine. Low-memory = 0 (no code or data). The machine will have the default memory size.

    • SimpleStackMachine

      public SimpleStackMachine​(int memSize)
      Initialise a new machine. Low-memory = 0 (no code or data).
      Parameters:
      memSize - the number of words of memory the machine will have

  • Method Details

    • setSafeMode

      public void setSafeMode​(boolean safeMode)
      Turn safe-mode on or off. By default, safe-mode is on. When safe-mode is on, the machine will enforce a read-only policy on the code section and will refuse to execute instructions that are outside the code section.
      Parameters:
      safeMode - true is on, false is off

    • loadBinary

      public void loadBinary​(java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.IOException
      Load binary from file. The first integer in the file must specify the length of the code section (everything up to but not including the start of the .data section).
      Parameters:
      filePath - file path of the binary
      args - command-line arguments to load into the .data section
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • step

      public void step()
      Execute the next instruction.

    • run

      public void run()
      Execute the code until the machine halts.

    • dumpCode

      public java.lang.String dumpCode()

    • dumpState

      public java.lang.String dumpState()

    • dumpCallStack

      public java.lang.String dumpCallStack()

    • isHalted

      public boolean isHalted()
